channel.title: LifePointe Church Sermon of the Week
channel.itunes:author: LifePointe Church
channel.description: LifePointe Church is a community passionate about cultivating a friendship with the Holy Spirit and discovering the life-giving truths of Scripture. Our mission is simple: to live out the message of Jesus Christ. For more information please visit https://www.livethemessage.org
channel.itunes:summary: LifePointe Church is a community passionate about cultivating a friendship with the Holy Spirit and discovering the life-giving truths of Scripture. item.title: Discover More
item.description: Our life in Christ is a life of unending discovery
item.itunes:summary: Our life in Christ is a life of unending discovery

item.title: Every Day Living
item.description: The Holy Spirit supplies the power you need for your day-to-day life
item.itunes:summary: The Holy Spirit supplies the power you need for your day-to-day life

item.title: God of Power
item.description: God is eager to reveal Himself to us through His power
item.itunes:summary: God is eager to reveal Himself to us through His power
item.itunes:subtitle: Guest Speaker

item.title: God of Order
item.description: As we continue in our "Holy Spirit Here" series, Drew Meyer unpacks the amazing paradox of our Father, who is a God of order, yet who moves in powerful and mysterious ways. In this sermon, we walk through 1 Corinthians 14 and discover how to more confidently pursue the spiritual gifts of the Holy Spirit as the Father intended.
item.itunes:summary: As we continue in our "Holy Spirit Here" series, Drew Meyer unpacks the amazing paradox of our Father, who is a God of order, yet who moves in powerful and mysterious ways. In this sermon, we walk through 1 Corinthians 14 and discover how to more confidently pursue the spiritual gifts of the Holy Spirit as the Father intended.
item.itunes:subtitle: Holy Spirit Here

item.title: Discover More - Part 2
item.description: God wants to wake us up to discover more of who He is and who He's created us to be. This week, we talk about the spiritual work that Christ wants to bring each of us into. Relationship is God's aim and He is giving us a clear invitation to discover more of that relationship.
item.itunes:summary: God wants to wake us up to discover more of who He is and who He's created us to be. This week, we talk about the spiritual work that Christ wants to bring each of us into. Relationship is God's aim and He is giving us a clear invitation to discover more of that relationship.
item.itunes:subtitle: Discover More
